status: MVP Completed - Ready for Quality Assurance

mvp_achievements.crud_operations: ✅ Full CRUD handlers for all models
mvp_achievements.error_handling: ✅ Comprehensive error handling with HTTP conversion

technical_fixes_completed.template_hardcoding: Fixed duplicate model generation and hardcoded references
technical_fixes_completed.dynamic_handlers: Handlers now work for any model, not just Todo

technical_fixes_completed.sql_generation: Dynamic SQL with correct field and table mapping

next_priorities.reason: Critical for production readiness and preventing regressions

architecture_notes.template_system: Tera with embedded templates via include_dir
architecture_notes.database: SQLx with SQLite, compile-time query validation
architecture_notes.error_handling: Miette for CLI, custom AppError for web
